MAN.TITLE: time_id

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a vector of inputs to the system
: if y is an impulse response
: if y is a step response.
: rational function with degree n denominator and degree n-1 numerator if y(1)==0 or rational function with degree n denominator and numerator if y(1)<>0.
: ||y - impuls(H,npt)||^2, where impuls(H,npt) are the npt first coefficients of impulse response of H

DESCRIPTION.P: Identification of discrete time response. If y is strictly proper (y(1)=0) then time_id computes the least square solution of the linear equation: Den*y-Num*u=0 with the constraint coeff(Den,n):=1. if y(1)~=0 then the algorithm first computes the proper part solution and then add y(1) to the solution

MAN.AUTHOR: Serge Steer INRIA
